document_name: National Action Plan for Sustainable Consumption and Production 2017-2022
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/CHL/2017/CHL-2017-12-25-National Action Plan for Sustainable Consumption and Production 2017-2022_4e8b4a9797dd19f3bee6160c37ae01d0.pdf
document_description: The National Action Plan for Sustainable Consumption and Production sets up the governmental strategic vision of how to drive Chile towards a low-carbon economy over the period 2017-2022.
